articles.title: The New Year rings in as Asia and Europe usher out stormy 2022 - CNA
articles.description: With fireworks in London, Paris and Berlin, hopes for an end to the war in Ukraine and a return to post-COVID normality, Europe and Asia bid farewell to 2022. It was a year marked by the conflict in Ukraine, economic stresses and the effects of global warming…
articles.content:

Festivities in Moscow were muted, without the usual fireworks on Red Square.
